name: Lebanese Rice Pudding
description: This started with a picture and recipe provided by my friend Modivin in the DIY eJuice discord from BBC food recipes.  We decided to make sweet rice the star as this is a rice pudding.  The VT Yoghurt drink makes adds a citrus cream to the rice and the bavarian cream gives it some thickness and mouthfeel.  Next up was the accents.  Needed a hint of vanilla, pistachio and cinnamon so I used those recipes a bit low for what they offer.
author: humanpuck

reviews.text: Can’t comment on authenticity to the actual food but this is interesting and delicious. Love the creamy rice pudding with hints of citrus and vanilla and a slight hint of cinnamon. Pistachio gets enhanced by the nuttiness of the rice and seems to be more than just a hint. It’s coming across as one of the main flavors to me, along with the rice and sweet apricot, but it’s lovely.
